frontmatter.name: Can I go home overnight/leave early?

nodes.html:
Short answer: no.
If you need to leave, make sure you have a good reason and check out with a member of staff. This is for fire safety and accountability reasons.

frontmatter.name: Can I start before I arrive?

nodes.html: While you can explore ideas, you cannot start implementing your project before the specified time.

frontmatter.name: Do I have to study Computer Science?

nodes.html: Nope! You don't have even have to know how to program, though it obviously helps.
We wish we could, but we don't have the budget.

frontmatter.name: Do I need to come with a team?

nodes.html: We'll be making teams after our opening ceremonies, so no pressure! You can if you want, but no more than four hackers per team.
Â£0 and your weekend. Royal Hackaway is free to attend with everything provided by our wonderful sponsors!
Bring your laptop, charger(s) and any other devices you wish to work on at the hackathon. Don't forget to bring a valid government ID (or RHUL student ID if you are an RHUL student).
Hackathons are programming competitions where people work together to make something cool over the course of a weekend.
We'll provide you with food across the weekend free of charge. Please make sure you let us know of any dietary requirements when signing up for your ticket.
Anyone 18+ who is either a current university student or has graduated in the past six months.
You and your team own anything you create. We recommend making it open source on GitHub.
